name: Shamrock Sour

ingredients.item: Agave syrup (one part agave nectar, one part water)
Egg white (that is about half of an egg white)

preparation:
No leprechauns were hurt in the making of this recipe.

Add all the ingredients to a shaker and shake without ice.

Fill with ice and shake again.

Strain into a double rocks glass filled with fresh ice.

Garnish with a mint sprig and a lemon wheel.
